name: TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce
author: TP Plugins

sections.description:
• Let your customers know when the price of the product has dropped.
  • Track of your customer’s most wanted products.
  • Learn what products , customers want it’s price to be dropped.
  • Add “product back to stock” track notifier.
  • 100% Responsive and mobile friendly.

TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce PRO add to your product’s page new form with several fields:
1. Name
2. Email
3. Price lower than (optional), (Maximal price your customer is willing to pay)
4. Add Checkbox for Newsletter (optional)

After customer subscribe, his request is saved in your store and waiting for a price drop.
There is a new cron job that run every 3 houres and check if the price of the product has dropped / back to stock, If so, the customers will receive an e-mail about it.

In your admin area you can see all customers and their requests (Who received an e-mail, Who is waiting for email), statistics and much more‚Ä¶

Learn more about TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce Plugin features.

LOOP DEMO

PRODUCT DEMO

Click Here to Get the Pro Version

Plugin Features

  • Works with variations types
  • Responsive Layout
  • Add ‚ÄúPrice Track‚Äù in Category / Shop / Archives pages (PRO)
  • On/Off back to stock option (PRO)
  • On/Off ‚ÄúWould like to receive special offers and deals‚Äù checkbox option (PRO)
  • Working with Most of Premium themes
  • Customize email notifier
  • Email Dynamic parameters
  • RTL support
  • 3 form types:
  1. Toggle (PRO)
  2. Lightbox (PRO)
  3. Open

* Custom CSS
* Custom Labels
* Add ‚ÄúPrice lower than‚Äù option (PRO)
* Change icons

  • ‚úÖ TP Products Compare for Woocommerce

  • ‚úÖ TP Product Tooltip for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce will add a new menu item called ‚ÄúTP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce‚Äù in wordpress menu. Here you are able to configure all the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Do I need to install Woocommerce in my site?

Of course, Our plugin works with Woocommerce so you need Woocommerce shop in your site.

What about mobile devices?

TP Price Drop Notifier for WooCommerce is 100% Responsive and tested on any device and screen resolution.

I need a feature that you don’t have

No problem! Contact Us Here and tell us what you need our team will be happy to help you.

Can I customize the Plugin?

Yes you can, go to plugin Settings and change colors, background, icons and more…

  • Update – WordPress 6.3.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 8.2.1 compatibility

1.0.2 – Update

  • Update – WordPress 5.8.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 6.0.0 compatibility

1.0.1 – 2021-11-07

  • Update – WordPress 5.8 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 5.8 compatibility

1.0.0 – Released on 07 July 2021

  • Initial release
